short_summary: Seeking contractor for Ship Repair of CCGS Amundsen in Quebec.
description: Acquisition of ship repair work on the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Amundsen, located in Quebec, QC.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Contract Title and Reference
### English Title
* CCGS Amundsen Refit - Spring 2024 - RFP
### French Title
* Radoub NGCC Amundsen - Printemps 2024 - DDP

## Solicitation Details
* **Reference Number:** WS4435657536
* **Amendment Number:** 4
* **Publication Date:** March 8, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 5, 2024, 14:00:00 AST (Atlantic Standard Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 22, 2025
* **Amendment Date:** April 3, 2024

## Contract Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites tenders from interested parties to provide ship repair work on the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Amundsen, located in Quebec, QC.

## Categories and Codes
* **NATICS Code:*
	+ 25111500 - Commercial marine craft
	+ 25111514 - Icebreaker

## Type of Contract
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

## Contact Information
* **Contact Name:** Melanie Parent
* **Contact Email:** melanie.parent@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice URL and Solicitation Details
Please visit the following URL to access the solicitation package and associated documents:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19033943?extsite=MTkwMzM5NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

The solicitation details are as follows:
* Solicitation Number: WS4435657536
* Reference Number: WS4435657536
* Amendment Number: 4

Please note that this solicitation has expired and is no longer accepting submissions.
